main event: A man observed a bright light in the sky while driving to work at 5:45 a.m. on November 17, 1960.
interesting points: The observer had military training and was experienced in aerial observation., The light was first seen as a brilliant white light approximately the size of a dime at arm's length., The light moved slowly in a southerly direction, then reappeared and began moving in a zigzag pattern., The observer was familiar with aircraft lights and stated that this object was definitely not an aircraft., The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds before fading away and was not photographed.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: a man with military training and experience in aerial observation
